PageInfo.Message:
In the Game Menu, selecting "World", then <COL
ffdc78>"Map"</COL>
will show a wider view of the world than the
mini-map.
To check various information useful to your
adventure
(Party member's current locations, enemies,
buildings,
place names or quest objectives), make sure to
use it.

Operating the "Map" in the Game Menu.
Local/Field/Global Switch:
[<KC UI_LB>/<KC UI_RB>] Switch Left/Right
Display Change:
[<KC UI_MAP_ZOOM_IN>/<KC UI_MAP_ZOOM_OUT>] Zoom
in/out
[<KC UI_Y>] Change transparency
Free Marker:
[<KC UI_MAP_FREEMARKER>] Place/Remove (Hold)
